title: STAT+: Government approves $60 billion of enhanced Medicaid funding for hospitals, other providers
description: The government has approved $60 billion of enhanced Medicaid funding for hospitals and other providers — money that will gradually get cut under Republicans’ tax law.
content: The government has approved $60 billion of enhanced Medicaid funding for hospitals and other providers — money that will gradually get cut under Republicans’ tax law.
